verses.verse: Then <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, This is the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>, and this is the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%> for <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>commanded<s%> to gather <S%H3664>together<s%> the <S%H1616>sojourners<s%> that were in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; and he <S%H5975>set<s%> <S%H2672>masons<s%> to <S%H2672>hew<s%> <S%H1496>wrought<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3559>prepared<s%> <S%H1270>iron<s%> in <S%H7230>abundance<s%> for the <S%H4548>nails<s%> for the <S%H1817>doors<s%> of the <S%H8179>gates<s%>, and for the <S%H4226>couplings<s%>; and <S%H5178>brass<s%> in <S%H7230>abundance<s%> without <S%H4948>weight<s%>;

and <S%H730>cedar<s%> - <S%H6086>trees<s%> without <S%H7230>number<s%>: for the <S%H6722>Sidonians<s%> and they of <S%H6876>Tyre<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H730>cedar<s%> - <S%H6086>trees<s%> in <S%H369>abundance<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> my <S%H1121>son<s%> is <S%H5288>young<s%> and <S%H7390>tender<s%>, and the <S%H1004>house<s%> that is to be <S%H1129>builded<s%> for <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> must be <S%H4605>exceeding<s%> <S%H1431>magnificent<s%>, of <S%H8034>fame<s%> and of <S%H8597>glory<s%> throughout all <S%H776>countries<s%>: I will therefore make <S%H3559>preparation<s%> for <S%H1732>it<s%>. So David <S%H3559>prepared<s%> <S%H7230>abundantly<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> his <S%H4194>death<s%>.

Then he <S%H7121>called<s%> for <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, and <S%H6680>charged<s%> him to <S%H1129>build<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%> for <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, As for <S%H3824>me<s%>, it was in my heart to <S%H1129>build<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%> unto the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> my <S%H430>God<s%>.

But the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> came to <S%H559>me<s%>, saying, Thou hast <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H7230>abundantly<s%>, and hast <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4421>wars<s%>: thou shalt not <S%H1129>build<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%> unto my <S%H8034>name<s%>, because thou hast <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H7227>much<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth<s%> in my <S%H6440>sight<s%>.

Behold <S%H1121><s%>, a son shall be <S%H3205>born<s%> to <S%H376>thee<s%>, who shall be a man of <S%H4496>rest<s%>; and I will give him <S%H5117>rest<s%> from all his <S%H341>enemies<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>; for his <S%H8034>name<s%> shall be <S%H8010>Solomon<s%>, and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%> and <S%H8253>quietness<s%> unto <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in his <S%H3117>days<s%>:

he shall <S%H1129>build<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%> for my <S%H8034>name<s%>; and he shall be my <S%H1121>son<s%>, and I will be his <S%H1>father<s%>; and I will <S%H3559>establish<s%> the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of his <S%H4438>kingdom<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>ever<s%>.

Now <S%H1121><s%>, my son, <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> be with <S%H6743>thee<s%>; and prosper <S%H1129>thou<s%>, and build the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>, as he hath spoken concerning <S%H1696>thee<s%>.

Only <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> thee <S%H7922>discretion<s%> and <S%H998>understanding<s%>, and give thee <S%H6680>charge<s%> concerning <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; that so thou mayest <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>.

Then shalt thou <S%H6743>prosper<s%>, if thou <S%H8104>observe<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> the <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and the <S%H4941>ordinances<s%> which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H6680>charged<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> with concerning <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: be <S%H2388>strong<s%>, and of good <S%H553>courage<s%>; <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H2865>not<s%>, neither be dismayed.

Now <S%H3559><s%>, behold, in my affliction I have <S%H3559>prepared<s%> for the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H3603>talents<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H3603>talents<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%>, and of <S%H5178>brass<s%> and <S%H1270>iron<s%> without <S%H4948>weight<s%>; for it is in <S%H7230>abundance<s%>: <S%H6086>timber<s%> also and <S%H68>stone<s%> have I <S%H3559>prepared<s%>; and thou mayest add <S%H3254>thereto<s%>.

Moreover there are <S%H6213>workmen<s%> with thee in <S%H7230>abundance<s%>, <S%H2672>hewers<s%> and <S%H2796>workers<s%> of <S%H68>stone<s%> and <S%H6086>timber<s%>, and all <S%H2450>men<s%> that are skilful in every manner of <S%H4399>work<s%>:

of the <S%H2091>gold<s%>, the <S%H3701>silver<s%>, and the <S%H5178>brass<s%>, and the <S%H1270>iron<s%>, there is no <S%H4557>number<s%>. <S%H6965>Arise<s%> and be <S%H6213>doing<s%>, and Jehovah be with <S%H3068>thee<s%>.
David <S%H1732><s%> also <S%H6680>commanded<s%> all the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H5826>help<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, saying,

Is not <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> with <S%H5117>you<s%>? and hath he not given you rest on every <S%H5439>side<s%>? for he hath <S%H5414>delivered<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> into my <S%H3027>hand<s%>; and the <S%H776>land<s%> is <S%H3533>subdued<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and <S%H6440>before<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%>.

Now <S%H5414>set<s%> your <S%H3824>heart<s%> and your <S%H5315>soul<s%> to <S%H1875>seek<s%> after <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>; <S%H6965>arise<s%> <S%H1129>therefore<s%>, and build ye the <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>, to <S%H935>bring<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, into the <S%H1004>house<s%> that is to be <S%H1129>built<s%> to the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
